description:
Boasting city views, Les Cariatides offers accommodation with a balcony, around 600 metres from Printemps Gallery. It is situated 1.6 km from Zoo Lille and provides a lift. The property is 500 metres from Coilliot House, and within 500 metres of the city centre.

With free WiFi, this homestay features a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and toaster. Towels and bed linen are available in the homestay. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Popular points of interest near the homestay include Hospice Gantois, Lille Flandres Train Station and Grand Place Lille. Lille Airport is 7 km from the property.

Offering quiet street views, Les Hortensias Blancs Studio is an accommodation situated in Amiens, 3 km from Zénith d'Amiens and 1.1 km from The Floating gardens Park. The property is set 500 metres from Berny's Museum, 500 metres from Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens and 4.7 km from University of Picardie Jules Verne. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Amiens Train Station is 1.1 km away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a terrace with garden views. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the city views. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Amiens Golf Club is 8.4 km from the apartment, while French-Australian Museum is 24 km from the property. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 67 km away.

hotel_name: Hôtel Littéraire Gustave Flaubert, BW Signature Collection
description:
Situated in the historic centre of Rouen, Hôtel Littéraire Gustave Flaubert, BW Signature Collection, offers accommodation with a literary theme in honour of the writer Gustave Flaubert. It is located 3 km from the Kindarena Stadium and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is included in each of the elegant rooms. All rooms have private bathrooms.

Breakfast is served every morning and can be enjoyed in the breakfast area or in the comfort of guest rooms. Guests are invited to relax in the hotel's cocktail lounge. The hotel is situated across the street from a number of French and international restaurants.

Notre Dame Cathedral of Rouen is just a 10-minute walk from the hotel and the Musée des Beaux Arts de Rouen is 800 metres away.

hotel_name: Expédition Malouine - Appt à 30m de la plage
description:
Expédition Malouine - Appt à 30m de la plage is set in the Sillon district of Saint Malo, 1.3 km from Bon Secours Beach, 400 metres from Palais du Grand Large and 500 metres from Casino Barrière Saint-Malo. It is situated 600 metres from Eventail Beach and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 90 metres from Sillon Beach.

The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Providing free private parking, this 2-star apartment also features free WiFi.

National Fort is 1.1 km from Expédition Malouine - Appt à 30m de la plage, while Grand Bé is 1.4 km away.

Ibis budget Amiens Centre Gare is set in Amiens city centre, a 5-minute walk from Amiens Train Station and a 15-minute walk from Notre-Dame of Amiens Cathedral. Free WiFi is provided.

All rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

A buffet breakfast can en enjoyed every morning.

The nearest airport is Paris Beauvais-Tille Airport, 50 km from the hotel.

hotel_name: Apparthôtel Mont Saint Michel - Résidence Fleurdumont
description:
Résidence Fleurdumont offers pet-friendly accommodation in Beauvoir. Mont Saint Michel Abbey is 4.4 km away. Résidence Fleurdumont also includes a seasonal outdoor pool, a tennis court and a pétanque playground. Free private parking is available on site.

Most units include a terrace or balcony. Résidence Fleurdumont features free WiFi and TV. Towels and bed linen are provided.

There is also a kitchenette, equipped with a microwave, a refrigerator and stovetop, as well as a coffee machine. A breakfast kit is provided every morning.

The nearest airport is Pleurtuit Airport, 42 km from Résidence Fleurdumont.

Located just 2.4 km from Plage des Fours à Chaux, Malouinière Guillaume Onffroy provides accommodation in Saint Malo with access to a garden, a shared lounge, as well as a shared kitchen. The property features garden views and is 2.8 km from Plage du Rosais and 3 km from Bas-Sablons Beach. Casino Barrière Saint-Malo is 5 km away and National Fort is 5.1 km from the bed and breakfast.

Featuring a private bathroom, units at the bed and breakfast also provide guests with free WiFi, while some rooms here will provide you with a terrace.

A continental breakfast is available at the property and includes fresh pastries and juice.

Solidor Tower is 4.7 km from the bed and breakfast, while Palais du Grand Large is 4.9 km away. Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport is 74 km from the property.

Situated within 300 metres of Printemps Gallery and 1 km of Hospice Gantois in the centre of Lille, Stay Appart Hotel Lille Centre features accommodation with free WiFi and seating area. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lille, like walking tours.

Popular points of interest near Stay Appart Hotel Lille Centre include Lille Opera, Zoo Lille and Coilliot House. Lille Airport is 10 km from the property.

Located in Strasbourg within 900 metres of Strasbourg Christmas Market, City Residence Access Strasbourg features accommodation with a TV and a kitchenette.

There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and free toiletries.

The 'Petite France' is a 12-minute walk from the aparthotel, while Strasbourg Cathedral is 1.2 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 10 km away.

Located between the European Institutions and the City Center, discover the emblematic Art Nouveau district in the streets of Neustadt. Go to the Palais des Congrès or the Parc des Expositions a few minutes walk away.

We are proud to welcome you in an environment respectful of nature, where every detail has been thought of for your comfort. May your stay with us be as pleasant as the sweet fragrance of a flower in full bloom.

hotel_name: Gîte de charme sur les remparts
description:
Offering quiet street views, Gîte de charme sur les remparts is an accommodation set in Eguisheim, 6.4 km from House of the Heads and 6.8 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. The property features garden and city views, and is 5.6 km from Colmar Train Station. The property offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The 1-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with slippers. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some chocolates or cookies. The accommodation is non-smoking.

If you would like to discover the area, hiking is possible in the surroundings and the apartment can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Colmar Expo is 10 km from Gîte de charme sur les remparts, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 34 km away. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport, 54 km from the accommodation.

Clos des Iris is set in a 19th-century house, just 400 metres from the centre of Moustiers-Sainte-Marie in the Gorges Du Verdon region. It offers traditional-style rooms featuring a private terrace and views of the flowered garden.

Free WiFi access and a desk are provided in the rooms at Clos des Iris. There is also an en suite bathroom in each one, which is complete with a hairdryer and a shower. The rooms do not have a TV.

Breakfast is served every morning either in the dining room or on the shared terrace. After breakfast, you can relax on the sun loungers in the garden while reading a newspaper.

Other local attractions include Sainte-Croix Lake, which is just 4 km from this 2-star hotel, and guests can enjoy water sports such as pedalo boats and canoeing. Plateau de Valensole, known for its lavender fields, is 28 km away. The area is also popular for hiking and paragliding. Free private parking is available on site and luggage storage is provided at reception.

Located on the banks of the Doubs River within the business complex known as La City, this ibis hotel is a 10-minute walk from Besançon city centre and its museums and a 35-minute walk from Citadelle.

The ibis Besançon La City offers air-conditioned rooms, 4 of which are equipped for people with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. The Bistro Régent restaurant offers a bistro menu based on fresh produce.

With a 24-hour front desk, this hotel offers secure underground parking at an extra fee.

Cordeliers metro station is a 2-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Lyon Saint Exupery, 30 km away. Public parking is available at a location nearby the hotel."

The restaurant has a panoramic terrace on the lake of Sainte-Croix serving dinner everyday.

All rooms feature a safe, a desk and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each room has its own private bathroom with a hair dryer. Guests will also find a welcome tray in each of the rooms.

A breakfast buffet can be enjoyed daily either in the dinning area or in your room. Breakfast includes a selection of fresh, local products including organic and gluten free options. An express take-away breakfast is also available upon request.

 Please note that there is no A/C in the appartment.

 Please note that the hotel is 100% NON-smoking. Any triggering of the fire alarme due to cigarette smoke is liable to a penalty of 190€.

 Please note that a pre-authorization can be made to guarantee your stay. Also, the payment can be asked at arrival.

Please note that the elevator stops at the middle floor. There are a few steps to access the rooms. The staff is at your disposal for any help.

The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 4.7 km from the accommodation, while Lyon Perrache Train Station is 5.4 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 23 km away.

Located in the centre of Lyon, just 600 metres from the Tête d’Or Theatre, Maison Hôtel offers self-catering duplex cottages. Foch Metro Station is ideally located 50 metres away.

The cottages are set on 2 levels and feature a living area with a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a bathroom. The kitchen includes a microwave, stove and dishwasher.

Grocery shops and restaurants can be found within 200 metres and an interior patio is accessible by both cottages. The Fine Arts Museum is a 13-minute walk away and Part-Dieu Train Station is 2 km from the accommodation.

hotel_name: Best Western Hotel du Pont Wilson
description:
Located in Lyon city centre, Best Western Hotel du Pont Wilson offers modern rooms and suites with a view of the Fourvière hill in the historic part of the city. Free WiFi is provided.

All guest rooms at Hotel du Pont Wilson are stylishly decorated, each with a different colour scheme. Rooms are equipped with satellite TV, and are serviced by a lift. Each of the white-tiled private bathrooms includes a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the guest's breakfast area or can be served in the privacy of the guest rooms for an extra charge. Express and take-away breakfast options including a hot beverage, a piece of fresh fruit, a dairy product, orange juice and pastries are available.

Hotel du Pont Wilson is situated opposite the Presqu’ile, where guests can visit the Musee des Beaux Arts. It is just 50 metres from the Liberté Tram Stop, and is a 15-minute walk from Part-Dieu Train Station.

Bayard Bellecour, an authentic historical house in the heart of the town. Enjoy all the modern comforts in a traditionally decorated building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.

Rooms at Bayard Bellecour have either flat-screen TV or free digital tablets. All room are air-conditioned. The private bathroom provides a hairdryer. The reception on the 1st floor and rooms on the 1st and 2nd floor are not serviced by lift. They are only accessible via a staircase

A buffet breakfast with cold and hot dishes is served every morning in the breakfast room. The buffet breakfast is made with local products and homemade food.

The Basilica of Notre Dame de Fourvière is 2 km from the property, while the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is a 17-minute walk away. Bayard Bellecour is 300 metres from Bellecour Metro Station and a 7-minute drive from Lyon Perrache Train Station.

hotel_name: Cosy appartement, dans les pentes de la Croix Rousse
description:
Situated in the centre of Lyon, Cosy appartement, dans les pentes de la Croix Rousse features accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. The property is around 2.7 km from Fourviere Roman Theatre, 4.1 km from Lyon Perrache Train Station and 5.3 km from Part-Dieu Train Station. Musée des Confluences is 7.2 km from the apartment and Eurexpo is 18 km away.

The 1-bedroom apartment features a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon, Musée Miniature et Cinéma and Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 36 km from the property.

Located in Lyon, Hotel Saint Vincent offers accommodation a 10-minute walk from Lyon National Opera. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All of its rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Free toiletries are also provided. An iron is available upon request.

Breakfast is available daily at a supplement. Hotel Saint Vincent also offers newspapers, luggage storage facilities and a 24-hour front desk. Bars and restaurants can be found less than 100 metres from the property.

Hotel Saint Vincent is located 50 metres from the River Saône and 600 metres from Lyon's Museum of Fine Arts. Lyon Perrache Train Station is an 18-minute drive away. A public paying car park is available a 5-minute walk away.

Situated in Lyon, 200 metres from Musée de la Resistance, MEININGER Hotel Lyon Centre Berthelot features accommodation with a bar, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Fourvière is 3.1 km away.

All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom.

The hotel offers a continental buffet breakfast.

There is a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen. The terrace is only open during the breakfast service.

The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 2.9 km from MEININGER Hotel Lyon Centre Berthelot, while Musée des Confluences is 2.4km from the property. Perrache Train Station is 1.3 km away. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 26 km from the accommodation.

Set in Lyon, 1.9 km from Part-Dieu Train Station, Bikube Lyon offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a terrace. Built in 2024, this 4-star hotel is within 3.4 km of Musée Miniature et Cinéma and 3.9 km of the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a business centre and free WiFi throughout the property.

The rooms come with a private bathroom, while selected rooms also feature a kitchenette.

A buffet, continental or vegetarian breakfast is available at the property. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Greek, Italian and Mediterranean cuisine.

Lyon Perrache Train Station is 4.6 km from Bikube Lyon, while Fourviere Roman Theatre is 4.9 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 24 km away.

Located 300 metres from Part-Dieu Train Station, the hotel features an on-site bar & restaurant with panoramic views of Lyon from the 32nd floor of the iconic Part Dieu Tower. It offers a fitness centre and free WiFi is available throughout the property. Private parking is available on site for an extra charge.

All rooms are air conditioned and provide panoramic views of Lyon. Equipped with a flat-screen TV, they feature a seating area, a private bathroom and a laptop safe.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the Celest Bar & Restaurant. Guests can have lunch or dinner onsite and enjoy the restaurant international and creative cuisine. Guests can also access the restaurant's food shop throughout the day.

Part-Dieu shopping centre is 100 metres away and metro station is 200 metres away. A6, A7, A42 and A43 motorways are all within a 20-minute drive from the hotel. The nearest airport is Lyon – Saint Exupery Airport, 27 km form Radisson Blu Hotel Lyon.

Private parking is available on site for an extra charge and under availability.

Located a 5-minute walk from the Presqu’île and a 10-minute walk from Place des Terreaux and Opéra de Lyon, Okko Hotels Lyon Pont Lafayette offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wifi throughout. The property is right in front of the Rhône River banks, where guests can find several bars and restaurants. Lyon’s Museum of Fine Arts is 12 minutes away on foot.

All rooms feature a Nespresso coffee machine and a flat-screen TV. The bathrooms are equipped with a shower and hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Fresh juices, Palais des thés teas, coffee and snacks are also included throughout the day free of charge in the lounge. In the evening, guests are offered a tasting plate of cheese or charcuterie (vegan option on request). A bar and a restaurant are also available on site.

Guests have access to a shared club lounge with a library and a newspapers selection. There is a free fitness centre and a gift ship selling local products.

Citadines Presqu'île Lyon is located in the centre of Lyon, between the Rhône and Saône Rivers in the heart of the Presqu'île district. It offers fully equipped studios and apartments with free WiFi access.

Each apartment and studio at Citadines Presqu'île Lyon has a safety deposit box, ironing facilities and satellite TV. The kitchenette has a fridge, microwave, dishwasher and toaster. Bed linen and towels are provided. Some units have air conditioning.

For an additional cost, a buffet breakfast is available daily in the breakfast room. The reception desk is open 24 hours a day. There is a launderette on site offering a dry-cleaning service at a supplement.

Citadines Presqu'île Lyon is located 450 metres from Cordeliers Bourse Metro Station. Vieux Lyon is a 6-minute walk away, while Place Bellecour is 500 metres from the property. Lyon-Perrache Train Station is a 13-minute drive away. Parking is available nearby for an additional charge and is subject to availability.

Hotel Du Parc is located in central Lyon, 450 metres from Massena Metro Station and a 10-minute walk from Lyon Part-Dieu Train Station. It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi.

The soundproofed guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen cable TV and a private bathroom.

Hotel Du Parc offers a daily buffet breakfast served in the hotel's breakfast room.

In addition to a 24-hour front desk, Parc hotel also provides a laundry and dry cleaning service.

Hotel Du Parc is within easy access of the new and old towns. The Parc de la Tete d’Or is 800 metres from the hotel and the Espace Tete d’Or Exhibition Centre is 400 metres away.

Located in Lyon, 1.9 km from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon, TRIBE Lyon Croix Rousse provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All units include a wardrobe.

Guests at TRIBE Lyon Croix Rousse can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

Part-Dieu Train Station is 3.8 km from the accommodation, while Musée Miniature et Cinéma is 4.5 km away. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 34 km from the property.

hotel_name: Les Suites de l'Opéra - Apartment Aretha for 4 people
description:
Les Suites de l'Opéra - Apartment Aretha for 4 people is located in the 1st arr. District of Lyon, 2.4 km from Part-Dieu Train Station, 1.7 km from Fourviere Roman Theatre and 1.7 km from Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere. The apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Lyon Perrache Train Station is 3.5 km from the apartment, while Musée des Confluences is 5.3 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 34 km away.

Situated in Lyon and with Part-Dieu Train Station reachable within 200 metres, Pullman Lyon features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Rooms come with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The units have a desk.

A buffet, continental or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 3.8 km from Pullman Lyon, while Musée Miniature et Cinéma is 4.3 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 32 km away.

hotel_name: Hôtel Vaubecour - Centre Lyon Ainay - Perrache
description:
Hôtel Vaubecour - Centre Lyon Ainay - Perrache is located in Lyon, on the 2nd floor of a building. Lyon’s Museum of Fine Arts is 1.6 km away and Lyon Perrache Train Station is 500 metres from the hotel. Free WiFi access is available.

Accessed via a lift, the non-smoking guest rooms feature a desk and a TV with satellite channels. The private bathrooms have a shower. Hôtel Vaubecour - Centre Lyon Ainay - Perrache offers a free daily cleaning service for your convenience.

Please note that the property does not have air conditioning.

Breakfast is available, which can be enjoyed in the breakfast room. A library and board games are at guests' disposal.

The hotel is 2.4 km from La Part-Dieu Business District. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 20 km away.

Please note that the elevator is not accessible to people with reduced mobility.

hotel_name: 50m² cosy près place Bellecour & vue s/ basilique
description:
In the 2nd arr. District of Lyon, close to the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon, 50m² cosy près place Bellecour & vue s/ basilique features free WiFi and a washing machine. It is set 1.3 km from Lyon Perrache Train Station and offers a lift. The property is 600 metres from Musée Miniature et Cinéma, and within 1.1 km of the city centre.

The 1-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with slippers. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Guests at 50m² cosy près place Bellecour & vue s/ basilique will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lyon, like cycling.

Fourviere Roman Theatre is 1 km from the accommodation, while Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere is 1.3 km away. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 28 km from the property.

Rooms at this Premiere Classe hotel include a TV, work desk and en suite facilities with a shower, washbasin and toilet. All rooms are accessible by lift and can accommodate a children's cot.

A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning.

Première Classe Lyon Centre Gare Part Dieu is an 8-minute walk to Part Dieu shopping mall. It is a 10-minute metro or bus ride from Vieux Lyon and 26 km from Lyon Saint-Exupéry Airport.

All guest rooms have air conditioning, a minibar and a safety deposit box. The private bathroom provides a hairdryer. Each room comes with a bottle of water, free toiletries and an international plug socket.

Buffet breakfast and express breakfast options are available daily at a supplement. In the evening, guests may relax in the hotel’s Plaza Bar. The reception desk is open 24 hours a day and free newspapers are offered in the lobby.

Mercure Lyon Centre Plaza République is 500 metres from Cordeliers Metro Station, while Place Bellecour is a 7-minute walk away. Lyon-Perrache Train Station is 13 minutes away by car.

Among the facilities at this property are room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with a sauna, and hot tub, as well as a terrace.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe.

Breakfast is available, and includes buffet, continental and vegetarian options.

Languages spoken at the reception include German, English, French and Italian.

Musée Miniature et Cinéma is 2.9 km from Keystone Hôtel & Spa, while Fourviere Roman Theatre is 3.6 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 28 km away.

In the 2nd arr. District of Lyon, close to Musée des Confluences, The charming, comfortable Charlemagne AIL has a garden and a washing machine. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The 1-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Situated in Annecy, 37 km from Rochexpo, Le Pélican features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms have a wardrobe.

A buffet, continental or gluten-free breakfast is available at the property.

description:

The property is fitted with an indoor pool and is set 500 metres from Part-Dieu Train Station. Facilities for disabled guests are also available.

At the aparthotel, the units include a desk and a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the aparthotel also have free WiFi. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. There is a coffee shop and lounge.

If you would like to discover the area, walking tours is possible in the surroundings and Nemea Appart Hotel So Cloud Lyon Gare Part-Dieu can arrange a bicycle rental service.

The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 3.9 km from the accommodation, while Lyon Perrache Train Station is 4.7 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 28 km away.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement. There is also a seating area and a fireplace.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

St. Pierre Cathedral is 46 km from the apartment, while Gare de Cornavin is 47 km from the property. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 43 km away.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while selected rooms will provide you with a terrace. At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. There is also a seating area and a fireplace.

Gare de Cornavin is 47 km from ALTAI Annecy Rent Lodge, while Halle Olympique d'Albertville is 47 km away. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 43 km from the property.

The apartment with a balcony and garden views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

The spacious apartment features 3 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Stade de Genève is 41 km from the apartment, while Jet d'Eau is 45 km from the property. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 41 km away.

Located 500 metres away from Lake Annecy, and a 12-minute walk from Annecy castle, Hôtel de Bonlieu offers accommodation with free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.

All rooms air air-conditioned and soundproofed. They are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom is equipped with a bath or shower.

Hôtel de Bonlieu provides a continental breakfast buffet daily. Guests can also choose to have breakfast served directly to your room.

Public parking is available nearby. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the train station and a 35-minute drive from Chambéry-Savoie airport.

The Hôtel des Alpes offers 2-star accommodation a 10-minute walk from Lake Annecy and 100 meters away from the train station. The old city, shops and restaurants are within walking distance.

All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a desk. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel has no lift but hotel staff is happy to help guests with their luggage if needed.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at Hôtel des Alpes. Guests can enjoy the onsite bar.

The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 48 km from the property. Public parking is available nearby. It is free from 19:00 to 08:00 and at extra charge during the rest of the day.

Our hotel has an elevator, starting from the 1st floor where stands the reception desk and serves 2nd and 3rd  .
There will be some more stairs to climb to get to  the 1st floor and the 4th. Please do not hesitate to ask for help upon arrival/departure.

The property is located 41 km from Stade de Genève, 45 km from Jet d'Eau and 45 km from St. Pierre Cathedral. The property features a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Some rooms have a balcony and views of the lake or the mountains. There is a room on the ground floor adapted to people with reduced mobility.

The restaurant's cuisine is inspired by international flavours. A bar is also available on site.

The property is 46 km from Geneva International Airport. Free public parking is available.

Enjoy a breakfast buffet as a way to start your day before heading out to visit the surrounding area.

The rooms feature a city view, a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with a bath or shower. They also offer a desk, a wardrobe and free toiletries. Breakfast in room is available at an extra cost.

The reception is open 24h/24h.

hotel_name: Le Splendid Hotel Lac D'Annecy - Handwritten Collection
description:
The property is facing the lake of Annecy and located in the centre of the old town of Annecy, a couple of paces of the shopping streets. We are also close to the cinemas, theatre and the best restaurants.

The rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a private bathroom with a bath or a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

You will find us on the banks of the Vassé canal, facing the lawn of Champ de Mars, next to the Pier for the lake tour in boat and beach at 200 metres. A fitness room is available.

This hotel is located in the heart of Annency, a few steps from the castle. It offers individually-decorated rooms with views of the canals, the medieval castle or the town.

Each air-conditioned guest-room in the 18th-century building has satellite TV, WiFi internet access and a private bathroom.

The Palais de l’Isle serves a daily buffet breakfast and guests are invited to relax with a drink in the bar. Guests are also able to purchase snack jars.

The Hôtel du Palais de l'Isle is just a few minutes’ walk from Lake Annecy and the cathedral. The property offers discount in the 3 nearby public car parks.

hotel_name: Le Pura Vida, Hyper centre Terrasse + Parking
description:
Located 33 km from Rochexpo and 37 km from Bourget Lake in the centre of Annecy, Le Pura Vida, Hyper centre Terrasse + Parking provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. This apartment offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace. The property is non-smoking and is set 38 km from Stade de Genève.

The 1-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Each room at Hôtel Les Muses is equipped with free WiFi access, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. Some rooms feature a terrace and air conditioning.

A breakfast buffet is served daily. Activities in the surroundings include hiking and water-skiing. The Lake of Annecy is 50 metres away, and the lake's beach is 250 metres from the property.

Free private parking is available on site. Hôtel Les Muses's multilingual staff can provide local tourist information.

Guest rooms at the Hotel du Nord are all non-smoking and air-conditioned. They come with en suite facilities.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at Hôtel du Nord.

Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the reception.

There is free overnight parking nearby. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 35 km from the property.

Located in the centre of Annecy, Hotel Les Terrasses is just a 5-minute walk from the Annecy's SNCF Train Station. It is set in a large landscaped garden and offers free WiFi.

The guest rooms at the Hotel Les Terrasses are all soundproofed and feature a desk and flat-screen TV. The private bathrooms have a bath or shower and air conditioning.

Breakfast is available for an additional charge at the property and can be enjoyed in the guest's room or on the terrace, weather permitting

description:

You have the possibility to luch here our take-away formulas consisting of a hot dish, a drink and a dessert. Choose from a wide selection of dishes and relax over a tasty meal.

The small parking area, which includes 10 spaces, is only accessible by reservation for a supplementary fee of 15 EUR per space. An electric charging station is available on request and subject to availability at a rate of €25.

Please note that our parking area is only suitable for standard-sized vehicles (a small courtyard in the city center).

The establishment is 5 km from the Micropolis convention center. Public parking is available on-site for an extra charge. Please contact the establishment directly if you wish to reserve a parking space.

If you are traveling with pets, please contact the establishment directly to inquire about the pet policies. It is essential to contact the establishment.

You will be accommodated in one of our 41 rooms situated across various buildings as follows:

• The Main Building with elevator access, where we have 21 rooms.
• The Annex, also in the main building, without elevator access.
• The Hotel Pavilion, where we have 9 rooms, without an elevator.
• The Workshop, with 2 spacious rooms specially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

If you have a preference, feel free to let us know during your reservation. While we cannot guarantee, we promise to always do our best to accommodate the various requests of our guests.

hotel_name: ibis Styles Strasbourg Stade de la Meinau
description:

Property Description
Set in a building dating from the 15th century, La Villa Mazarin is located in the fortified city of Aigues-Mortes. It offers a terrace and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free WiFi is available throughout.

The guest rooms have air conditioning, heating, satellite TV, a telephone and a fridge. All rooms are furnished in 17th-century Provençale style.

In the hotel's restaurant, La Table, you can enjoy French culinary specialties or choose from a selection of light meals and snacks. The salon opens onto the courtyard and sun terrace. The restaurant is open in the evenings from Wednesday to Sunday from 7pm to 9pm, and only at weekends for lunch (noon to 1pm).
Closed on Mondays and Tuesdays.

The Villa Mazarin has a private underground car park 1.85 m high.
This option, which costs €18 per day per vehicle, must be booked in advance (subject to availability, as the number of spaces is limited).

Your pet (dog or cat) is welcome (ON RESERVATION - one pet per room - supplement of €25 per day applies). Please contact us beforehand.

Our relaxation area is available until midnight (sauna, steam room, fitness room, swimming pool heated between 23° and 26°).

Montpellier is 35 km from La Villa Mazarin, while Nîmes is 43 km away. The nearest airport is Mediterranee Airport, 25 km from the property.

description:

A continental breakfast is available daily at the aparthotel. Guests can take advantage of the warm weather with the property's barbecue facilities.

Located 500 metres from the Granet Museum, Hôtel Le Mozart offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. It is easily accessed from Motorway A8, a 3-minute drive away.

Additional facilities in the rooms include an LCD TV with satellite channels. The rooms also provide a telephone and an en suite bathroom, which is complete with a bath or shower.

You can enjoy the buffet breakfast in the dining room or on the terrace.

Free private parking is available onsite. Alternatively, guests can keep their vehicle in the secure garage for a supplementary cost and upon reservation. Electric car charging station is available subject to availability. Newspapers are also available at the 24-hour reception.

Every unit has a private bathroom with free toiletries, while certain rooms include a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave. At the guest house, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the guest house will be able to enjoy activities in and around Aix-en-Provence, like hiking and walking tours.

Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 36 km from Domaine de Carraire, while Joliette Metro Station is 36 km away. Marseille Provence Airport is 32 km from the property.

The air-conditioned guest rooms feature an LCD TV and a paid minibar. The private bathrooms are equipped with a bath or shower, free Nuxe toiletries and a hairdryer. Some of the rooms also offer a view of the Cours Mirabeau.

Meeting facilities are available and there is a 24-hour reception. Upon reservation and for an extra charge, guests can relax in the onsite spa with a hot tub, sauna and hammam and guests benefit from reduced rates for a 1-hour spa pass and for the onsite treatments.

hotel_name: Bed and Breakfast Jardin de Marie
description:
Bed and Breakfast Jardin de Marie is located in Aix-en-Provence and offers B&B accommodation. This 17th century property features a garden, a shared lounge and a common area with complimentary tea and coffee. Guests also have access to free WiFi.

All rooms include a seating area and a flat-screen TV. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast is served at the property every day, which includes croissants and fresh bread.

The bed and breakfast is 100 metres from Cours Mirabeau where a number of shops and restaurants can be found.

Public Parking is at 300m from out property..

Aix-en-Provence Train Station is 300 metres away.

The property has inner courtyard and quiet street views, and is 30 km from Joliette Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 30 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels, Blu-ray player and DVD player, as well as a CD player are available. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

hotel_name: Odalys City Aix en Provence Les Floridianes
description:

Free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, including BeIN Sport, are provided in the accommodation, which also has seating area. All of the air-conditioned rooms and suites at Odalys City Aix en Provence Les Floridianes have a private bathroom.

The fully equipped kitchenette in the apartment includes a dishwasher, microwave and a small dining area. Les Floridianes also serves a buffet breakfast in the dining room which opens onto the terrace surrounding the pool.

Gare d’Aix-en-Provence Train Station and Jourdan Park are both 500 metres from the residence. The A8 Motorway is 1.6 km away. Undercover parking is available on site with a supplement.

Hôtel Rotonde is located in central Aix-en-Provence, 5 minutes' walk from the SNCF train station. Free WiFi is provided, together with free on-site parking subject to availability.

It offers soundproofed rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and a minibar. Each has a bathroom with hairdryer.

Hôtel Rotonde serves a continental buffet breakfast. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the bar or on the shaded terrace.

The hotel is 300 metres from Cours Mirabeau and 30 km from Marseille Provence Airport.

hotel_name: thecamp Hôtel & Lodges - Aix en Provence
description:
Situated in Aix-en-Provence, 25 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, thecamp Hôtel & Lodges - Aix en Provence features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Featuring a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Some units at the property have a balcony with a mountain view.

At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk. Some rooms also boast a kitchen with a fridge, an oven and a microwave. All rooms in thecamp Hôtel & Lodges - Aix en Provence are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast is available at the accommodation.

Guests at thecamp Hôtel & Lodges - Aix en Provence will be able to enjoy activities in and around Aix-en-Provence, like hiking and cycling.

Joliette Metro Station is 25 km from the hotel, while Vieux Port Metro station is 26 km from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 19 km away.

hotel_name: Grand Hôtel Roi René Aix en Provence Centre - MGallery
description:
Located just a 5-minute walk from Cours Mirabeau and the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Grand Hôtel Roi René Aix en Provence Centre - MGallery is a 4-star hotel featuring a heated seasonal outdoor pool open from April to the end of september. It also boasts a terrace, a fitness centre and free WiFi access.
Each air-conditioned guest room has been decorated in a contemporary style and includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a safe. The private bathroom comes with either a bath or shower, bathrobes, a hairdryer, slippers and free Occitane toiletries. All rooms have a Nespresso coffee machine.
Traditional French cuisine is served in the hotel's restaurant, La Table du Roi. Guests can enjoy a drink in L'intemporel bar.
Grand Hôtel Roi René - MGallery Collection is 400 metres from the train station. Private parking is available upon request and for an additional fee.

Set 700 metres from Cours Mirabeau in Aix-en-Provence, Casa Hotel provides accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi .

The studios, suites and apartments feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower. The kitchenette has a microwave, fridge and stovetop. Some units include a dining area and/or a terrace.

A continental breakfast is available at the property on certain days of the week.

Saint-Sauveur Cathedral is 800 metres from Casa Hotel. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 26 km from the accommodation.

Accessed via stairs, the guestrooms at Hotel Paul feature a flat-screen TV, a desk and a fan. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower.

During the summer months, guests can relax in Paul Hotel's garden, which features tables and chairs with sun shades. There is also a TV room.

Every morning a continental breakfast is served for an extra charge. For lunch and dinner, guests can choose from a range of cafes and restaurants found within 400 metres of the property.

Aix-en-Provence train station is 1.5 km from the hotel and Marseille Marignane airport is 30 km away. Marseille is 35.5 km away. Public parking is available nearby.

This boutique design hotel is located in the centre of Aix-en-Provence and offers 55 rooms. If features a terrace and a lounge.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Cézanne have free WiFi access.  All rooms include satellite TV with more than 50 channels and some have views over the town.

At Hôtel Cézanne there is a terrace with an outdoor bar, where guests can enjoy an aperitif. There is also a meeting room.

Breakfast can be taken until 10:30 and offers fresh juice bar, home-made savoury dishers, pastries, pancakes, brioche, artisanal charcuterie boards, jam from Hautes-Alpes and a gluten-free selection. It can be enjoyed in the outdoor bar in fine weather.

The property is 200 metres from the Cours Mirabeau and 300 metres from a bus station, with connections to the airport and the TGV train station. Aix-en-Provence TGV train station is 12 km from the hotel.

The rooms at the Boutique Hotel Cézanne have free WiFi access and air-conditioned during hot season. All rooms include satellite TV with more than 50 channels and some have views over the town.

Private secured parking is available on site for an additional fee.

Languages spoken at the reception include English and French.

Marseille Provence Airport is 21 km from the property.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning, and free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the hotel.

With a 24-hour reception, the Hotel escaletto offers easy access to all the main tourist attractions of
Aix-en-Provence.

All units are air-conditioned and some of them have a seating area with a flat-screen TV, and a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also boast free WiFi, while certain rooms come with a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available nearby. The bed and breakfast has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Guests will find public parking just 50 metres away from the property, available at an extra cost.

All rooms have air conditioning, a desk and a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

A la carte breakfast is served every morning at La Caravelle. A continental breakfast is also available at a reduced rate includes a hot drink, a croissant, a glass of fruit juice, bread, butter and jam.

The hotel includes video surveillance and free computer access in public areas. Public parking is nearby, and a private parking is also available on site for an additional fee (reservation is needed before arrival, 3 spots available)

Model photos of the establishment from 2024.

For daily needs there is a grocery shop 50 metres away and you can also chose one of the restaurants in the city centre. Palais des Papes is 800 metres away and the Wine Route is 10 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Individually decorated, all air-conditioned rooms, TV, wardrobe and a Nespresso coffee machine, and Damman teas. The en suite bathroom is complete with a hairdryer and free eco-friendly toiletries.

A continental breakfast is provided each morning at La Banasterie. Guests can also sample traditional cuisine in the restaurants found within walking distance. Four lounges are available, one includes a bar and an other features a library.

Located just of the famous Cours Mirabeau in the heart of the old town of Aix-en-Provence, Hotel Les Augustins is set within the walls of a 12th-century convent.

The hotel features spacious rooms combining traditional architecture and modern facilities. Each room provides air conditioning, a TV and a minibar.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the dining room or in the comfort of guest rooms. There is also free Wi-Fi access in the entire hotel and a 24-hour reception,

Each air-conditioned room includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms are non-smoking and have a contemporary bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms feature a balcony with views of the courtyard.

hotel_name: Chanteloche CLIM Netflix Disney by Rentabao
description:

These apartments feature free WiFi access and guests are provided with a map of the city, as well as, restaurant and bar recommendations.

Activities in the local area include cycling, hiking and canoeing.

The apartment is situated 6 km from Avignon TGV Train Station and 83 km from Marseille Provence Airport.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. description:
Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer is located in a residential district, 750 metres from the Palais des Congrès and 1 km from the Velodrome Stadium. This aparthotel offers an indoor swimming pool. Perier Metro Station is just 150 metres away and WiFi access is free.

A fully-equipped kitchen equipped with hotplates is a standard facility in the accommodation at Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer. All studios and apartments have an LCD TV and some have a separate bedroom.

Featuring mountain views, Astoria Villa maison d hôtes Appartement vue mer avec piscine offers accommodation with patio, around 200 metres from Bestouan. This homestay features a private pool, a garden and free private parking. When staying at the homestay, guests can use private entrance.

The units come with air conditioning, a dishwasher, an oven, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. A terrace with an outdoor dining area and sea views is offered in all units. At the homestay, each unit comes with a balcony, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV.

Grande Mer is 1.4 km from Astoria Villa maison d hôtes Appartement vue mer avec piscine, while Anse de Corton Beach is 1.9 km away. Marseille Provence Airport is 47 km from the property.

Located in Cassis, 400 metres from Bestouan and 700 metres from Grande Mer, Le Bel Ecrin par Dodo-a-Cassis offers a casino and air conditioning. It is set 1.1 km from Anse de Corton Beach and provides a minimarket. Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking apartment has an open-air bath.

The apartment with a balcony and sea views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Guests at the apartment can enjoy fishing and hiking nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace.

Orange Velodrome Stadium is 20 km from Le Bel Ecrin par Dodo-a-Cassis, while Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station is 20 km away. Marseille Provence Airport is 46 km from the property.

Chez Jacques par Dodo-a-Cassis is set in Cassis, 1.4 km from Anse de Corton Beach, 20 km from Orange Velodrome Stadium, as well as 20 km from Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station. The air-conditioned accommodation is 300 metres from Bestouan, and guests can benefit from on-site private parking and complimentary WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located less than 1 km from Grande Mer.

The apartment with a terrace and sea views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre is 20 km from the apartment, while La Timone Metro Station is 21 km away. Marseille Provence Airport is 46 km from the property.

hotel_name: LE SON DES VAGUES VUE MER
description:
A recently renovated property, LE SON DES VAGUES VUE MER is situated in Cassis near Bestouan, Grande Mer and Anse de Corton Beach. This beachfront property offers access to free WiFi and free private parking. The property is non-smoking and is located 20 km from Orange Velodrome Stadium.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with sea views. The air-conditioned unit at the property features a walk-in shower and a dressing room. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Bike hire and car hire are available at the apartment and the area is popular for snorkelling and fishing. If you would like to discover the area, hiking is possible in the surroundings.

Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station is 20 km from LE SON DES VAGUES VUE MER, while Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre is 21 km from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 46 km away.

Situated in Cassis, 500 metres from Bestouan and 500 metres from Grande Mer, HORIZON BLEU Vue Mer offers air conditioning. This beachfront property offers access to free WiFi and free private parking. The accommodation features a shuttle service, while a car rental service is also available.

The apartment with a terrace and sea views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Cassis, like hiking and walking tours. If you would like to discover the area, snorkelling, cycling and fishing are possible in the surroundings and HORIZON BLEU Vue Mer can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Anse de Corton Beach is 1.1 km from the accommodation, while Orange Velodrome Stadium is 20 km from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 45 km away.

hotel_name: LA MAISON SUR LE PORT 4 pers vue mer
description:
Situated in Cassis, 300 metres from Grande Mer and 600 metres from Bestouan, LA MAISON SUR LE PORT 4 pers vue mer offers air conditioning. This beachfront property offers access to free WiFi and free private parking. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from Anse de Corton Beach.

The apartment with a balcony and sea views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Cassis, like snorkelling, fishing and hiking. If you would like to discover the area, walking tours is possible in the surroundings.

Orange Velodrome Stadium is 19 km from LA MAISON SUR LE PORT 4 pers vue mer, while Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station is 20 km away. Marseille Provence Airport is 45 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

hotel_name: Home Cassis - Maison Les Calanques - Piscine chauffée
description:
Home Cassis, situated 1 km from the port of Cassis, is a residence of 4 apartments with a shared swimming pool. It is 5 minutes from the beach and the picturesque coastline cliffs of Cassis. Free Wi-Fi and private parking are available on site.

The properties feature modern décor and include a living room with flat-screen TV. The fully equipped kitchens include a fridge, oven, microwave and coffee machine. The bathrooms have a walk in shower, and the private terrace is furnished with a BBQ. A petanque court is on site.

These self-catering homes are a 12 minute walk from grocery shops, bars and restaurants. Marseille and Bandol are both within 30 km, and Toulon is 45 km away.  Cassis Train Station is 5km from the property and the nearest bus stop is just 100 metres away.

Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, La douceur de Cassis is located in Cassis. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Orange Velodrome Stadium is 20 km away and Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station is 20 km from the apartment.

The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with sea views. Guests can take in the ambience of the surroundings from an outdoor dining area.

A water park is available on-site and both cycling and walking tours can be enjoyed within close proximity of the apartment.

Popular points of interest near La douceur de Cassis include Bestouan, Grande Mer and Anse de Corton Beach. Marseille Provence Airport is 46 km away.

hotel_name: HPC Suites - Parking Gratuit & Piscine Chauffée
description:
Offering a shared outdoor pool with a terrace and views of the sea, HPC Suites - Parking Gratuit & Piscine Chauffée is situated in a 4000 metres² park in the centre of Cassis. Marseille is 16 km away and the nearest beach is a 10-minute walk away. Free private parking is available on site.

The property was entirely renovated in 2019. Featuring a terrace, all units include a dining area and a seating area with a flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchen, fitted with an oven and microwave. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine. HPC Suites - Parking Gratuit & Piscine Chauffée features free WiFi throughout the property. Towels and bed linen are offered.

Free private secure parking is available.

The port is an 8-minute walk away and many restaurants and a traditional Provençal market can be found in the neighbourhood.

You can play table tennis at the property, and the area is popular for diving and cycling. Aix-en-Provence is 35 km from HPC Suites - Parking Gratuit & Piscine Chauffée. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 36 km from the property.

hotel_name: Home Cassis - Maison Mediterranée - Piscine chauffée
description:
Located less than 1 km from Grande Mer, Home Cassis - Maison Mediterranée - Piscine chauffée offers an infinity pool, a casino and air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property features mountain and pool views, and is 1.1 km from Bestouan. The holiday home has parking on-site, a solarium and private check-in and check-out.

Each unit is equipped with a terrace offering sea views, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a well-fitted kitchen and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests can enjoy a meal at an outdoor dining area at the holiday home.

A minimarket is available at the holiday home.

Activities such as snorkelling, cycling, fishing can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. Guests can also relax in the garden.

Anse de Corton Beach is 1.4 km from the holiday home, while Orange Velodrome Stadium is 19 km away. Marseille Provence Airport is 45 km from the property.
